Package model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
model.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Holds Tiles, Sets Tile state during and after turns, Determines legal moves Tallies score

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.HashMap<Position,​java.util.LinkedList<Tile>> getLegalMoves​(Color player)
    Gets legal moves for current player
    int getScoreOf​(Color player)
    Calculates the score of a given player.
    Tile getTile​(int x, int y)  
    Tile getTile​(Position pos)  
    static Board makeBoard()
    Returns the Board with 64 Tiles
    void playPiece​(int x, int y, Color player, java.util.HashMap<Position,​java.util.LinkedList<Tile>> legalMoves)
    Places a piece on the Tile in the given location of the color of the given player, and flips co-linear Tiles accordingly
    void playPiece​(Position pos, Color player, java.util.HashMap<Position,​java.util.LinkedList<Tile>> legalMoves)
    Places a piece on the Tile in the given location of the color of the given player, and flips co-linear Tiles accordingly
    void reset()
    Resets the Board, setting all Tiles except the middle four empty, setting the middle four Tiles as specified by Othello variant, and emptying the player lists except for the initial Tiles.
    java.lang.String toString()  

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • makeBoard

      public static Board makeBoard()
      Returns the Board with 64 Tiles
      Returns:
      the Board

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the Board, setting all Tiles except the middle four empty, setting the middle four Tiles as specified by Othello variant, and emptying the player lists except for the initial Tiles.

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile​(int x, int y)
      Parameters:
      x - X coord
      y - Y coord
      Returns:
      The tile on this position.

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile​(Position pos)
      Parameters:
      pos - The position
      Returns:
      The tile on this position.

    • getLegalMoves

      public java.util.HashMap<Position,​java.util.LinkedList<Tile>> getLegalMoves​(Color player)
      Gets legal moves for current player
      Parameters:
      player - The player to get legal moves for
      Returns:
      LinkedList with legal moves positions in format [x, y]

    • playPiece

      public void playPiece​(int x, int y, Color player, java.util.HashMap<Position,​java.util.LinkedList<Tile>> legalMoves)
      Places a piece on the Tile in the given location of the color of the given player, and flips co-linear Tiles accordingly
      Parameters:
      x - x coord of Tile to play on
      y - y coord of Tile to play on
      player - Which player to play for
      legalMoves - The map of legal moves and path of pieces to each move (i.e. return value of getLegalMoves)

    • playPiece

      public void playPiece​(Position pos, Color player, java.util.HashMap<Position,​java.util.LinkedList<Tile>> legalMoves)
      Places a piece on the Tile in the given location of the color of the given player, and flips co-linear Tiles accordingly
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the Tile to play on
      player - Which player to play for
      legalMoves - The map of legal moves and path of pieces to each move (i.e. return value of getLegalMoves)

    • getScoreOf

      public int getScoreOf​(Color player)
      Calculates the score of a given player. Undefined behavior if parameter is Color.EMPTY.
      Parameters:
      player - The player's color, BLACK or WHITE. Undefined behavior if EMPTY.
      Returns:
      The score of that player.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of this board.
